name: Missed Single Removal
script:
if ak.ai() then return end
boardaffs = boardaffs or {}
weaponattack = weaponattack or {}
if #boardaffs > 0 then
   table.remove(boardaffs, #boardaffs)
elseif #weaponattack > 0 then
	 if weaponattack[#weaponattack] == "the thorny vines covering your arms" and affstrack.crushedherb then
	 	  table.remove(weaponattack, #weaponattack)	 
	 end
   table.remove(weaponattack, #weaponattack)
end
matches: ^([\w'\-]+) dodges nimbly out of the way\.$
^([\w'\-]+) quickly jumps back, avoiding the attack\.$
^([\w'\-]+) twists (his|her) body out of harm's way\.$
^A reflection of ([\w'\-]+) blinks out of existence.$
^([\w'\-]+) parries the attack with a deft manoeuvre.$
^([\w'\-]+) steps into the attack, grabs your arm, and throw
^A chaos orb intercepts the attack against (\+) and renders it harmless\.$
^([\w'\-]+) moves into your attack, knocking your blow aside before viciously countering with a strike to your head\.$
^Cracks spider across the surface of the crimson shield surrounding ([\w'\-]+)\, before it abruptly winks out of existence\.$
^Grey fog begins to rise from the suddenly panicked\-looking ([\w'\-]+)\.$
